name: WaveSplash
description:
Take control of an awesome lil blue dude and destroy all in your path! Eliminate all the evil tanks, cars, and motorcycles that stand in your way, all while listening to a banger lo-fi song.  All you need to enjoy this game is a keyboard and mouse.

  • A single-player, High-Score driven game featuring plenty of death and fun along the way
  • Awesome music to serenade your soul to
  • Fight your way through waves of techno tanks and cars to become the best

Note: This game was made in 48 hours for the ScoreSpace Jam #13 in which we had to make a high-score game with a theme of dodging. 

Every asset and sound was created by me during this time.
